Simple:

Go into the part.cfg, scroll down a bit until you feel comfy and plant these lines firmly:

RESOURCE
	{
		name = Food
		amount = 60
		maxAmount = 60
	}
RESOURCE
	{
		name = Water
		amount = 60
		maxAmount = 60
	}
RESOURCE
	{
		name = Oxygen
		amount = 60
		maxAmount = 60
	}
RESOURCE
	{
		name = Waste
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 60
	}
RESOURCE
	{
		name = WasteWater
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 60
	}
RESOURCE
	{
		name = CarbonDioxide
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 60
	}
